p: Introduction: Many of the patients admitted to the ICU receive a tracheostomy and are discharged whit it to the general ward. Insufficient skills and experience of staff caring for tracheostomy patients may lead to suboptimal care and increased morbidity and mortality. Tracheostomy outreach teams and an appropriate training to the staff are the key to improve quality of care, decrease adverse events and make decannulation with safety in these patients.
